title: LF D5+ Top Laner for my team in Competeleague
body:
My team that has recently qualified for the D+ Premier League in Competeleague is looking for a new top laner. We have a group of 4 experienced 5's players looking for someone who simply mains top lane and has a good attitude.
- must be available for scrims throughout the week (usually around 7pm EST on Monday/Saturday and looking to expand to more days)
- must be available on wednesday around the same time with 0 exceptions, as thats when the games for the league are played
- must MAIN TOP NO ROLE SWAPPERS
- basic macro knowledge

replies.body: Hi Im a Diamond 5 in sever singapore and im main top. Im a good top laner and can improve to be better.
Hi Im a Diamond 5 in sever singapore and im main top. Im a good top laner and can improve to be better.
